column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''4''' is the fourth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Hrestasse: A New Quenya Dialogue" — Margaret Dean.
* "Essitalmar: The Roots of Middle-earth Names and Places" (column) — [[Tom Loback]].
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
